short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion to the WordPress plugin Friends. Follow Mastodon accounts, reply to toots. Send to Post Collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the RSS/Atom feeds on the current page provides as well as reveal rel=me URLs that the website author used to point to their other public profiles.

If you use the Friends plugin for WordPress, you can add the current site as a friend.
